Articles.Content:
Good day, I am not able to launch KSP 1.12.0 on Mac. I just updated Steam and KSP to the latest system today and KSP will not launch. Just had it running as of 12 hours ago on 1.10.9. After the update there is prompt for User password authentication in order to even try to launch the game and never enters a loading screen before sending a crash report. I uninstalled and redownloaded KSP through Steam and still experiencing the same issue.

I reached out to KSP support via Email, but wanted to check here if anyone else was having a similar problem. 

Best,

Edited June 26, 2021 by NBDesigns
Hello @NBDesigns, your issue has been split into a dedicated thread for better visibility.

Moderator, please deactivate thread as the issue has been resolved, 

 

Thanks
